dir-section.heading: Water
dir-section.p: In 1980 a law was approved, creating Municipal Enterprises for Water Supply and Sewerage (DEYA) to manage drinking water and sewerage throughout Greece. Since then some 230 DEYA have been established.

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Athens Water and Sewerage Company (EYDAP SA)

dir-section.heading: Trade Unions
dir-section.p: There are about 5,000 registered trade unions, grouped together in 82 federations and 86 workers’ centres, which are affiliated to the Greek General Confederation of Labour.

org-entry.content-note: confederation of 14 marine unions

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Supreme Administration of Greek Civil Servants’ Trade Unions
